endDate.description: Deadline for payments to be due

updatePendingPayments.description: true to update the possible properties of already existing pending payments

walletId.description: Asaas wallet identifier that will be transferred

fixedValue.description: Fixed amount to be transferred to the account when the payment is received

percentualValue.description: Percentage of the net value of the charge to be transferred when received
